snippet.title: RiffTrax: The Game - Official Trailer (Steam, PS, Xbox, Switch)
snippet.description:
Coming May 5th to Steam, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation, and Xbox One! 
Wishlist Now: https://rifftrax.com/thegame

RiffTrax: The Game is a multiplayer party game where players compete to make bad movies funny. Grab your friends and make fun of some of the worst cinematic abominations ever created. 

- Over 250 movie clips from RiffTrax classics such as “Rollergator”, “Attack Of The Supermonsters”, and “Plan 9 From Outer Space”! 
- Featuring two exciting ways to play! Write your own riff and watch your comedy genius come to life via text-to-speech. Or leave it to the pros and choose from over 2,000 expertly crafted riffs from the RiffTrax team. 
- Play head-to-head with up to 6 players using any internet connected device as controller. An additional 12 audience members can also play along. 
- Bring the party to your friends with support for remote games, cross play, and voice chat. 
- Streamers, get your entire chat in on the action with Twitch chat voting. Additional moderation, privacy, and content tools ensure your stream remains problem-free. 

Learn more: https://www.rifftrax.com/game

Subscribe for more: http://rifftrax.com/YouTube
Watch full movies from RiffTrax: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4w3x0hXQwFh826DIW8mFrDYTdzF0XvOp
Watch movies explained by RiffTrax: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4w3x0hXQwFj2NmZ2IhDZJwoEsU2HoCTP
See behind the scenes on Patreon: https://rifftrax.com/patreon
Stream 100s of riffs for a few bucks a month: https://rifftrax.com/friends
Try the new Roku App: https://rifftrax.com/roku
See RiffTrax Live in theaters: https://rifftrax.com/live

Follow @RiffTrax

Twitter: https://rifftrax.com/twitter
Facebook: https://rifftrax.com/facebook
Instagram: https://rifftrax.com/instagram

#RiffTrax
